attributes.action: Allow safe drug consumption rooms to operate legally within Scotland.
attributes.additional_details:
In Canada, Canadian SCS attended to around 15,000 overdoses and drug-related medical emergencies between 2017 and 2019 at the centres with no reported fatalities on-site. SCS connect receptive clients to substance use treatment and other health and social services that include medical care, mental health support, and/or housing services. Canadian SCS made around 70,000 referrals to such services between 2017 and 2019.
Scotland can help fix the high level drug problem.
attributes.background: Drug legislation is reserved to the UK government, please consider drug consumption rooms as this is a good way to cut down on needles in the street, the transmission of infectious diseases such as HIV & allows drug users to access help and support to stop. This is all evidenced in other countries.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Devolve powers to the Scottish Government relating to drug consumption rooms: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573104

Introduce Drug Consumption Rooms to prevent drug-related deaths in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548575

Implement all of the recommendations of the Problem Drug Use in Scotland report: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550468
